sn_conv_fa_metadata.description: Give the sys_id of the factory request, get the services that were build as a result.
sn_conv_fa_metadata.io_metadata: {"inputs":[{"internal_name":"factory_request_number","hint":"The request id of the factory request that built the service","defaultValue":"none","isHidden":false}],"outputs":[{"internal_name":"instance_url","hint":"URL of the ServiceNow instance","defaultValue":"http","isHidden":false},{"internal_name":"app_scope","hint":"The SysId of the ServiceNow Application built by the factory","defaultValue":"none","isHidden":false},{"internal_name":"names","hint":"The names and descriptions of the services that are part of the product","defaultValue":"None","isHidden":false}]}
sn_conv_fa_metadata.name: Get Services Built by Digital Factory
sn_conv_fa_metadata.required_translations: [{"message":"The request id of the factory request that built the service","comment":"Translation required for hint","code":"sn_conv_fa"},{"message":"URL of the ServiceNow instance","comment":"Translation required for hint","code":"sn_conv_fa"},{"message":"The SysId of the ServiceNow Application built by the factory","comment":"Translation required for hint","code":"sn_conv_fa"},{"message":"The names and descriptions of the services that are part of the product","comment":"Translation required for hint","code":"sn_conv_fa"}]
sn_conv_fa_metadata.sys_name: Get Services Built by Digital Factory
